name: node-red-contrib-nlp
description: Provides a NLP parser to Node-RED
author: paullessing <paul@paullessing.com>

scripts.release: yarn version && git push && git push --tags
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:static && yarn build:js
scripts.watch: yarn build && concurrently --names "script,static,server" --prefix-colors "cyan,white,green" "yarn watch:ts" "yarn watch:static" "yarn watch:server"
scripts.server:link: yarn link && cd test && yarn link node-red-contrib-nlp
